#summary Showcase implemented in with Wicket and Grails

= Technologies = 

== View ==
 * [http://wicket.apache.org/ Wicket 1.4.12]
 * [http://www.grails.org Grails 1.3.4]

== Service ==
 * [http://www.grails.org Grails 1.3.4]

== Persistence == 
 * [http://www.grails.org Grails 1.3.4]

= Start up help =

 # Download and install [http://www.grails.org/Download Grails 1.3.4]
 # Checkout project
 # Open terminal and go to directory `web/wicket/grails-wicket/`
 # Start the app with `grails run-app`
 # Open your browser and go to http://localhost:8080/grails-wicket
